## Call Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

### Find the Derivative

```{r}
fx = expression(x^2)

dfdx = D(fx, "x")
dfdx

x <- 3
eval(dfdx)

```

### Find the Derivative

```{r}
Pa = expression(2*(3*a+2)^4-5)

dPda = D(Pa, "a")
dPda

a <- 1.2
eval(dPda)
```
